SetBonus.4: Whenever any squad member enters the field using a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>, all squad members gain 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Astral</color>, up to a maximum of 3 stacks, and lasting 15s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. Each stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Astral</color> increases the DMG dealt by the character entering the field using a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> by 8%. Only one instance of this effect can exist in the same squad.
